techmeme.title: Jalisco's governor says Foxconn's $900M Guadalajara plant, the largest Nvidia GB200 server assembly site, will be built in a year despite Trump's tariff threat (Amy Stillman/Bloomberg)
Sources: Didi Autonomous Driving is seeking to raise new funding at a $5B valuation; it raised a $298M Series C led by Guangzhou Automobile in October 2024 (Dong Cao/Bloomberg)
CoreWeave's S-1 shows ~77% of its $1.9B revenue in 2024 came from its top two customers, one of them being Microsoft, which accounted for 62% of total sales (Bailey Lipschultz/Bloomberg)
A former CEO and chair of Intel says the company shouldn't be broken up since its foundry unit now has the tech and manufacturing know-how to compete with TSMC (Craig Barrett/Fortune)
Creator monetization platform Passes and its CEO, Lucy Guo, are sued for allegedly distributing CSAM; the suit claims Guo intervened to override safety measures (Amanda Silberling/TechCrunch)
